verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Hungry I come to you for I know you satisfy I am empty but I know your love does not run dry

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: So I wait for you, so I wait for you

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: I'm falling on my knees, offering all of me Jesus you're all my heart is living for

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Broken I run to you for your arms are open wide I am weary but I know your touch restores my life
